models.passenger_model module

class models.passenger_model.PassengerModel[source]

Bases: object

Model to manage passengers.

static create_passenger(data)[source]

Insert a new passenger record into the database.

Parameters:

data (dict) – Passenger details with keys: - first_name (str) - last_name (str) - age (str) - username (str) - email (str) - dob (str, optional) - gender (str) - password (str): Hashed password

Returns:

True if successful

Return type:

bool

static find_by_email(email)[source]

Find a passenger by email address.

Parameters:

email (str) – Email address of the passenger

Returns:

Passenger dictionary if found, None otherwise

Return type:

dict or None
